hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.KF Midos Top Right Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)
locations.DMC Upper Grotto Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: If Gorons eat rocks, does that mean I'm in danger?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Gerudo Card#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #Skulls#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Bomb Bag#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Gerudo Card#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path of #Skulls#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #Din's Fire#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #Skulls#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room
